content.rendered:
Directed by Joseph P. Genier. Christian Taylor. Katie Eastridge. Mike Elliott. Jason Ensler.

Written by Jeff Davis. Jeff Davis. Edo van Belkom. Emily Eslami. Emily Eslami. Jeffrey Nieves. Jeffrey Nieves. Carlos Foglia. Krystal Houghton Ziv. Sean Crouch. Alessandra Jara Del Castillo.

Cast Bella Shepard (Blake Navarro). Chloe Rose Robertson (Luna Briggs). Tyler Lawrence Gray (Harlan Briggs). Rodrigo Santoro (Garrett Briggs). Sarah Michelle Gellar (Kristin Ramsey). Lanny Joon (Officer Jason Jang). Rio Mangini (Austin). Bailey Stender (Phoebe). Hollie Bahar (Ranger Prisha). Stella Smith (Tia). James Martinez (Roberto Navarro). Amy Pietz (Kendra Lang). Zack Nelson (Cyrus). Nevada Jose (Danny Navarro). Rainer Dawn (Cody). John L. Adams (David Lang). Chase Liefeld (Baron). Holly Firfer (News Anchor). Gideon Emery (Malcom). Sean Philip Glasgow (Connor). De’Variyay Harris (Damon). Blaise Reyes (Marco). Si Chen (Raya). Nobi Nakanishi (Vice Principal Kasai). Olivia D. Dawson (Bus Driver). Danielle Liggens (Emma). Bria Brimmer (Nurse Hughes). Patience Dodson (Ashley). John Patrick Jordan (Officer Trent Miller). Todd Allen Durkin (Mr. Caldwell). Kenny Alfonso (Dr. Salgado). Luisa Vitor (Ms. Patterson). Julian Wanderer (Young Harlan). Tamika Shannon (Officer). Jaime Andrews (Ellen Ryan). Kurt Yue (Dr. Liang). Benjamin/Ep Keepers (Nix). Sheylon Haywood (Evacuee 1). Bobby Hernandez (Quintero). Brian Childers (Evacuee 2). Jake Mateo (DJ Asher). Hayley Brown (Evacuee 3). Erica Frene (Mrs. Kirk). Kenny Arnold (Rinzler). Victor Chong (Harper). Aisling McBee (Young Luna). Blayne Weaver (Security Guard Maguire). Aaron Robey (Bodybuilder Ronnie). Sebastian Soler (Dancing Partier). Robert Tinsley (Police Officer (uncredited)). Christopher Cocke (Bar Patron (uncredited)). Michael L. White (Police Officer (uncredited)). Elizabeth M. White (Burn Patient (uncredited)). Tatyana White (Police Officer (uncredited)). Shaundrel Land (Disaster Survivor (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Carlos Foglia. Haweni Keskessa. Krystal Houghton Ziv. Sean Crouch. Jeff Davis. Mike Elliott. Sarah Michelle Gellar. Joseph P. Genier. Karen Gorodetzky. Angela Harvey. Eric Sherman. Christian Taylor. Jason Ensler.

Production Capital Arts Entertainment. MTV Entertainment Studios. Paramount+.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2023–)
